annotations: Dear all, Good day. Pls pps suitable biz for our below firm:  MV BBG BAISE  OPEN TIANJIN ON ABT 22-29TH,AUG, TRY ANY TCT TO PERIODGRAIN CLEAN,2X25,N.ORE,UNDER DECK LOG,WWRS/DOC 5/5,BOD  REVERTING, LAST 5: MANGANESE/PETCOKE/GRAIN/SALT/GRAINNO-REDSEA TRANSIT / RUSSIA / B.SEA / GOA / UKRAINE  1)      20-30K1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR 20 DAYS WOGDEL: S CHINA – N VNRDL: MALAYSIALAYCAN:23-26TH,AUGCOMM:3.75% 2)      28-35K1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR 20 DAYS WOGDEL: TO MAKE MALSYSIARDL: CHINALAYCAN:16-18TH,AUGCOMM:3.75%  3)      NEXT WCSA TO CHINA IRNO ORE28-38K IRON ORE IN BULKILO,PERU/ DAFENG OR RIZHAO OR CJK OR SONGXIA,CHINA8000/12000LAYCAN: 20-30TH,SEPCOMM:2.5%PART CARGO, TCT OK     ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   1.MV BBG BAISE TYPE: ULTRAMAX SUB TYPE: BULK CARRIERflag / class: liberia /lrCRANES 4 X 30.5 MT / GRABS 4 X 12 CBM (REMOTE CONTROLLED) BUILT: 2021 BY DACKS DWT/DRAFT: 61,180 MT DWT / 13.025 M SSW TPC / TPI: 60.50 MT AT FULL SUMMER DRAFT LOA/BEAM: 199.90 M (LOA) / 32.24 M (BEAM) LBP: 197 M GRAIN/BALE: 77,546 CBM GRAIN / 75,126 CBM BALE HO/HA: 5/5  SPEED & CONSUMPTION: ------------ LADEN: ABT 14 KTS ON IFO 28.3 MT (380CST) BALLAST: ABT 14.5 KTS ON IFO 28.3 MT (380CST)  LADEN: ABT 12 KTS ON IFO 20.0 MT (380CST) BALLAST: ABT 12.5 KTS ON IFO 20.0 MT (380CST)  PORT IDLE: abt 3.8mt IFO PORT WORKING: abt 5.0mt IFO   TKS AND BEST REGARDS!Warren GaoAS AGENT ONLYTEL&WHATSAPP:+8618516690500QQ& WECHAT:244167672SKYPE: ORIENTASIALONG
